ReportText: Exam: XR CHEST AP OR PA ONLY Technique: Single AP portable view of the chest is sent for review. Indication: Altered mental status. Comparison: [DATE]. FINDINGS: A single view of the chest was obtained. The lungs appear well-expanded and clear. Mediastinal and cardiac contours are within normal limits. Visualized osseous structures appear intact. IMPRESSION: 1. No active disease in the chest.
